actions.text: Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Markey.
The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) and on the bill pusuant to the rule.
On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 174 - 250 (Roll no. 294).

description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to limit the eligibility to hold a noncommercial license to those that serve an educational, instructional, cultural, or educational religious purpose.
purpose: An amendment made in order by H. Res. 527 to clarify that the service obligations of noncommercial broadcast stations are required to frame certain programs in an educational format.
